personal_projects.title: Pair Trading Algorithm
personal_projects.description: Developed an algorithm to identify suitable asset pairs using historical data from Yahoo Finance. The algorithm tracks price movements and calculates the spread to trigger trades when conditions are met. Results are visualized using line graphs and heatmaps.

personal_projects.title: R Dashboard
personal_projects.description: Created a dashboard to visualize and streamline analysis of sales and marketing data at Ford Motor Company. Utilized the statistical programming language R to develop the dashboard, enabling better decision-making through data visualization.

personal_projects.title: Excel-based Lookup and Comparison Tool
personal_projects.description: Developed a tracker during my time in ROTC at Eastern Michigan University to enable efficient lookup of each Cadet's gear/clothing record. The tool streamlined the process of managing and comparing inventory records.

personal_projects.title: Mean Reversion Analysis Project
personal_projects.description: Implemented a mean reversion trading strategy using Python. The project involved analyzing historical stock data, identifying mean reversion opportunities, and executing trades based on statistical signals. Results were presented using visualizations.

bio: I am a data-driven professional with a passion for leveraging data to drive business decisions. I have a strong background in data analysis, data visualization, and programming, with experience in Python, R, SQL, and Tableau. I am currently pursuing a Master of Data Science & Business Analytics at Wayne State University. I am a quick learner, a team player, and a problem solver, with a proven track record of delivering high-quality work. I am excited about the opportunity to apply my skills and expertise to make a positive impact.

education.degree: Master of Data Science & Business Analytics
Bachelor of Business Administration in Accounting Informaiton Systems
Associate of Science in Criminal Justice

favorite_quotes: The only way to do great work is to love what you do. If you haven't found it yet, keep looking. Don't settle. As with all matters of the heart, you'll know when you find it. - Steve Jobs
Success is not the key to happiness. Happiness is the key to success. If you love what you are doing, you will be successful. - Albert Schweitzer
The best way to predict the future is to invent it. - Alan Kay
